install.name: System - jNoRightClick
install.author: Val Markov
install.description: jNoRightClick is a Joomla 1.5 plugin created by SiteGround. It prevents your visitors from using the right mouse button on your Joomla website, which is an effective way to protect your texts and photos from being copied without authorization.

param.name: errmsg
param.default: Right clicking is disabled on this page!
param.label: Error Message
param.description: Displays an error message when a user tries to right-click on your page.

param.name: allow_admin
param.label: Allow in admin area
param.description: Allows right-click usage in the administrator area.

param.name: allow_users
param.label: Allow for users
param.description: Allows right-click usage by already logged in users (i.e disables only for guests). Please note that changing this will also affect administrator area option as well, since to access it you need to be logged in.
